name: CSG Boxes
description:
CSG Boxes A game where you move csg boxes and help the player get to the green marker! - Gameplay - 

The're are nine levels.  Blue and red spaces hurt you. Green spaces can only be moved once!  Empty colorless spaces can be moved aslong as the player isn't in them. If you fall outside of a box then just press R to restart the level! 

The timer runs from the first level to the last level!

- Controls - 

Use the mouse to move empty space and wasd to move the player! R to restart the levels!

- Note -

The downloadable version is less laggier. But if you prefer the web version, then don't mind me. For some reason if the browser leaderboard doesn't refresh then refresh the page and reopen the game.
